title: Why is Kha'Zix such a weak champion?
body: I was playing Kha'Zix today I managed to get 400+ AD and I wasn't doing any damage, you know when the adc beats you 1v1 that something isnt right. Its not that I don't play Kha either, I am a frequent player, he feels much weaker after what I assume was the most recent patch.

replies.body:
Build Last Whisper, Black Cleaver, Hydra, and Lethality Items. You can literally two-shot tanks. Kha'Zix isn't weak; you're just playing/building him wrong.

Full AD on Kha'Zix isn't too great unless you have LOADS (i.e. 900-1000AD). At least, this is just from my PoV.

Didn't realise Lethality was still viable/was viable on Kha'Zix, might try it, thanks!

I'm not great at this game or anything but why build bloodthirster and infinity edge? Isnt khazix meant to jump on and instaburst to death and jump out? Both items are focused on aa which khazix shouldnt need to do many to kill an adc...
Maybe try a deaths dance instead of bloodthirster (if you want to heal) and like yomous or EON or anything like that instead of IE
